page.title: 01Sidmouth/Chit Rocks:03120084
page.content:
99% of this 4 x 3 km block is sea with the remaining 1% of land on the seafront at Sidmouth, a well-known East Devon seaside and retirement area with a predominately pebble beach. The town of Sidmouth is renown for its annual international folk festival which takes place in July. Musicians, dancers and spectators flock to Sidmouth to participate in and savour this truly international festival. Sidmouth is an annual entrant in the Britain in Bloom competition and has been an outstanding winner.
The 1% area of land in this block is the foreshore dominated by Chit rocks, a rocky outcrop mostly submerged at high tide.
